def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x, y, z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_small = is_small(y, ctx)
        check_y_light_grey = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_above_right_x = are_above_right([y], [x], ctx)
        check_z_medium = is_medium(z, ctx)
        check_z_grey = is_grey(z, ctx)
        check_z_below_x = are_below([z], [x], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_small
            and check_y_light_grey
            and check_y_above_right_x
            and check_z_medium
            and check_z_grey
            and check_z_below_x
        ):
            results.append([x, y, z])
    return results
